attributes.action: Ban Parliamentary MP and Party bulk emails to the public
attributes.additional_details:
Given a recent wave of what appears to be 'spam' to personal email accounts by a particular party.
I call for a ban on bulk emails being sent to the personal email accounts of the British public.
They are invasive, unaccountable, manipulative in information, can be unsolicited, harassing follow ups.
Unfair for smaller parties to use.
